title: Low background fps
body:
Hey there. Can you finally add opinion to disable FPS limiter, if the league game will not be focused? (alt-tabbing and such)
I'm streaming and I alt-tab a lot. The game looks laggy for a viewer, because of your background fps limiter. I think it isn't that hard to add one button in a game opinion. Thank you. All streamers would like to use this opinion.
Edit 1:
See here is my problem. I'm using bordeless or windowed. I'm alt-tabbing often. And the problem is that I can't set up my background FPS limiter, because the league has no opinion for that like Diablo 3
https://i.stack.imgur.com/nwWlF.jpg
And here is my alt-tabbed game. Only 20 fps, because it isn't focused. Usually I've got over 300 fps. I've got two monitors.
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/303306970658504704/341563486276419584/unknown.png

Im having a hard time how BOTH people that reply to your problem suggest what you already explained you have done.

Are we getting a fix to this soon or is this completely being overlooked?

If you know that alt-tabbing is something that needs to be done, you may want to try running the game in borderless as opposed to fullscreen. That will give you an easier time when switching windows and might be a bit better for the stream. Other than that, you should probably be alright if you can stay in the game, as alt-tabbing can cause some pretty weird interactions especially with stream software running as well.

Actually I'm using a bordeless settings or windowed. Let me show you something. I've alttabed my game and focused the browser. I've got 20 fps, because of that.
[My two monitors](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/303306970658504704/341563486276419584/unknown.png)
A lot of games can actually set up BACKGROUND fps limiter. for example [Diablo 3 background fps settings](https://i.stack.imgur.com/nwWlF.jpg). The problem is that LoL has no settings for background fps limiter. It's constantly set up to 20. And I would like you to bring that opinion.

Keeping your FPS limited is actually to prevent horrible lag because spikes can and will happen. League of Legends does frequently lag for streamers unless you have a beast of a computer and WiFi connection, you're probably just fine as it is. What works the best for me while tabbing out is windowed borderless actually, maybe give that a try. Warning though, you can click out of the screen.
